类 PopUpPageController

java.lang.Object
com.study.journey.controller.PopUpPageController

public class PopUpPageController extends Object
Title: PopUpPageController.java Description: Controller class for pop-up pages. This class handles the creation and closing of pop-up pages. Copyright : Copyright (c) 2023/5/25

  • 方法详细资料

    • makePopUpPage

      public PopUpPageController makePopUpPage(io.github.palexdev.materialfx.controls.MFXButton button) throws IOException
      Creates a pop-up page based on the button clicked. This method is called to create a pop-up page when a specific button is clicked. It determines the type of pop-up page based on the button's ID and sets up the corresponding FXML file, CSS file, and title for the pop-up page. It loads the FXML file, sets up the scene, creates a new stage, and shows the pop-up page.
      参数:
      button - the button that triggers the creation of the pop-up page.
      返回:
      the PopUpPageController instance associated with the created pop-up page.
      抛出:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while loading the FXML file or setting up the scene.

    • closePage

      public void closePage(io.github.palexdev.materialfx.controls.MFXButton button)
      Closes the current page. This method is called to close the current page when a specific button is clicked. It retrieves the stage associated with the button's scene and closes the stage.
      参数:
      button - the button that triggers the closing of the current page.
